author: Special Correspondent
text:
After Hardik Patel announced that he would go on indefinite fast in Surat jail, his supporters torched two buses of the Gujarat transport in Surat on Thursday night. Lodged in jail in a sedition case in Surat, the 22-year-old leader of the Patel stir announced that he would observe a fast to protest the treatment the authorities allegedly meted out to him.

“Two buses were set on fire by a mob comprising more than 40 people,” said a police official, adding, “a compliant has been lodged and the police probe is on to identify them.”
title: Hardik on fast, supporters indulge in arson
